item.title: Comp Compendium
item.description: Set 16 Flex Guide by CHRISTOPHO Contains: Tempo Lvl 8 / 9 Yunara Freljord Ionia XP / Gold Void Diana T-Hex Lissandra / Voli Bilgewater Reroll Tryndamere / Ashe Yasuo / Yone Illaoi Hero Augment Set 16 T-Hex Piltover Guide by asholley1015 Set 16 Rek’Sai Reroll Guide by G_Ree .

item.title: TFT Set 16 - Bard meta
item.description: Bard’s Caretaker trait is very powerful. Caretaker After winning player combat, gain a random unit from Runeterra.

item.title: TFT Set 16 - Swain Positioning
item.description: Swain is one of the most splashable units of this set, be it for his traits (Arcanist giving AP to the entire board, Juggernaut makes him more reliably durable and Noxus can be a good addition, especially with Bronze for Life) or for his AoE CC.

item.title: Flares and Bahamut's Pinnacle
item.description: Zettaflare The strongest Bahamut… no, Final Fantasy spell? Let’s venture into the different versions of Flare throughout Final Fantasy history and the franchise.

item.title: Ragù alla bolognese
item.description: One of the simplest, most flavourful ragù you can make.

item.title: Roadmap for learning the Hungarian language
item.description: As some of you might know, my girlfriend is Hungarian.

item.title: Atomic design
item.description: Atomic design is a methodology composed of five distinct stages working together to create interface design systems in a more deliberate and hierarchical manner.

item.title: Keystone correction
item.description: When a projector is placed at an angle to the screen, the projected image becomes distorted into a trapezoid shape instead of a rectangle.

item.title: Lens-shift function
item.description: Lens shift is a mechanical adjustment in a projector that moves the lens inside the projector housing.

item.title: Projector light sources
item.description: Projector light sources fall into two broad families: traditional lamp-based sources and solid-state sources.
